A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a Star Wars movie like the original once. It has the same flaws the original trilogy hast. The out of the place humor. The pointless plotpoints. A few plotholes. All in all a perfect Star Wars movie. Total enjoyable and darker than any Star Wars movie before. The lines between dark and lightside of the force were never blurry like in this one. The people are only complaining about the Bad stuff but this movie has so much great scenes.
